  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120773</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120773</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Skrite leče, točkovni  viri</string>
            <string language="en">Hidden lenses, point sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versteckte Objektive, Punktquellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objectifs cachés, sources de point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lentes escondidas, fontes do ponto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivi nascosti, sorgenti del punto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κρυμμένοι φακοί, πηγές σημείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lentes ocultadas, fuentes de la punta</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Iz poteka žarkov ugotovi goriščne razdalje leč, ki jih ne vidimo.</string>
            <string language="en">By observing the ray diagram determine the focal points of lenses that are hidden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">goriščna razdalja</string>
            <string language="en">focal length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">leča</string>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indem Sie das Strahldiagramm beobachten, stellen 
Sie die Schwerpunkte der Objektive fest, die versteckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En observant le diagramme de rayon déterminez 
les points focaux des objectifs qui sont cachés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observando o diagrama do raio determine os pontos
focais das lentes que são escondidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservando lo schema del raggio determini i punti
focali degli obiettivi che sono nascosti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με την παρατήρηση του διαγράμματος ακτίνων καθορίστε 
τα σημεία εστίασης των φακών που είναι κρυμμένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observando el diagrama del rayo determine los 
puntos focales de las lentes se ocultan que.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fokale Länge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur focale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comprimento focal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza focale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εστιακό μήκος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φακός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud focal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
